vocabulary.definition: unusual and exciting because of coming from far away
vocabulary.example: She loves trying exotic foods from different countries.

vocabulary.definition: not stated or described in detail
vocabulary.example: The meeting time was unspecified, so we didn't know when to arrive.

vocabulary.definition: to develop and change gradually over time
vocabulary.example: Technology continues to evolve rapidly, improving our daily lives.

vocabulary.definition: to alter something slightly in order to improve it
vocabulary.example: The designer decided to tweak the logo to make it more modern.

vocabulary.definition: limits or restrictions that define acceptable behavior or actions
vocabulary.example: Innovation often occurs when we push the boundaries of what is considered possible.

vocabulary.definition: to change something in some small way to create something new and exciting
vocabulary.example: The chef decided to twist the traditional recipe by adding a secret ingredient.
